text: Before replying to this, she glanced hastily around, then spoke in tones so low that he had to bend his head to hear:'I will never be any man's mistress. As to marrying again ... if I were free ... there is only one man I would wish to marry ... but ... he like myself, is now bound.
handwritten_text: Before replying to this, she glanced hastily around, then spoke in tones so low that he had to bend his head to hear:'I will never be any man's mistress. As to marrying again ... if I were free ... there is only one man I would wish to marry ... but ... he like myself, is now bound.
